short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select web text for abstracts or references.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to select and copy text snippets as you browse the internet, sending them directly to a storage window. The options are endless! From obtaining reports of your online readings, creating summaries, and studying with the selected text, to streamlining your focus on the narratives that interest you the most.

Not only that, it is an excellent tool for reviewing publications and using them as assistance for writing. For avid readers and professionals seeking relevant information, this extension is an invaluable ally.
Particularly in the scientific realm, it allows you to abstract the most valuable information from readings and store the source's origin for future reference.

"selected Text" goes further by offering you the ability to download the selected readings as files, providing you with the convenience and accessibility you need for both professional work and learning from online textual sources.

In summary, the "selected Text" extension is a must-have tool for those looking to optimize their online reading experience, streamline the process of gathering relevant information, and enhance their learning effectively
